items.question: Is Amatdda free?
items.answer: Yes, all basic features are free to use. There are no ads.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: Data is stored locally by default. Sign in to sync securely to the cloud.

items.question: Can I use it on multiple devices?
items.answer: Currently, each device operates independently. Data is stored locally on each device, with cloud sync features coming soon.
